模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Actor.UserPlane

类 UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.Actor.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.Actor.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.Actor.UserPlane.UserPlane
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends FighterPlane
The UserPlane class represents the player's controlled plane. It extends FighterPlane and provides functionality for moving the plane, firing projectiles, upgrading projectiles, and handling the plane's interactions in the game.

  • 属性概要

    applyBoundsCheck()

    Moves the plane to the right by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to 1.

    Updates the plane's actor state.
    void

    Updates the size of the projectile based on its power level.

    Upgrades the projectile's power level if it's below the maximum level.

      private boolean isPaused
      Flag to determine if the game is paused. If true, certain actions like firing projectiles are disabled.

  • 方法详细资料

    • upgradeProjectile

      public void upgradeProjectile()
      Upgrades the projectile's power level if it's below the maximum level.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the plane's position based on its horizontal and vertical velocity.
      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • applyBoundsCheck

      private void applyBoundsCheck()
      Applies the boundary checks to ensure the plane does not move out of bounds (keyboard).

    • moveUserPlane

      public void moveUserPlane(double deltaX, double deltaY)
      Applies the boundary checks to ensure the plane does not move out of bounds (mouse). Moves the plane by a given delta in the X and Y directions.
      参数:
      deltaX - The change in the X position.
      deltaY - The change in the Y position.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the plane's actor state. This method is called every game tick to update the plane's position and hitbox.
      指定者:
      updateActor 在类中 ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectiles

      public List<ActiveActorDestructible> fireProjectiles()
      Fires projectiles from the user's plane.
      指定者:
      fireProjectiles 在类中 FighterPlane
      返回:
      A list of projectiles fired by the user plane.

    • updateProjectileSize

      private void updateProjectileSize()
      Updates the size of the projectile based on its power level.

    • moveUp

      public void moveUp()
      Moves the plane upwards by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to -1.

    • moveRight

      public void moveRight()
      Moves the plane to the right by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to 1.

    • moveLeft

      public void moveLeft()
      Moves the plane to the left by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to -1.

    • moveDown

      public void moveDown()
      Moves the plane downwards by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to 1.

    • stopVerticalMovement

      public void stopVerticalMovement()
      Stops the plane's vertical movement by setting the vertical velocity multiplier to 0.

    • stopHorizontalMovement

      public void stopHorizontalMovement()
      Stops the plane's horizontal movement by setting the horizontal velocity multiplier to 0.

    • getNumberOfKills

      public int getNumberOfKills()
      Gets the number of kills the user has made.
      返回:
      The number of kills.

    • incrementKillCount

      public void incrementKillCount()
      Increments the kill count by 1.
